# Heatmap
```{r}
col_fun = colorRamp2(c(-2, 0, 2), c("blue", "#D3D3D3", "red"))
Idents(CAM)<-"Treatment"
Genes2Plot<-CAM_Treatment_Markers%>%
    group_by(cluster) %>%
    top_n(n = 15, wt = avg_log2FC)
Sub<-subset(CAM,downsample=200)
Data<-t(Sub@assays$RNA@scale.data[unique(Genes2Plot$gene),])
Data<-cbind(as.data.frame(Data),Sub$clusters_labeled,Sub$Treatment)
colnames(Data)[dim(Data)[2]-1]<-"Cluster"
colnames(Data)[dim(Data)[2]]<-"Treatment"
Data<-Data[order(Data$Treatment,Data$Cluster),]
Treatment<-Data$Treatment
Cluster<-Data$Cluster
Data<-Data[,1:(dim(Data)[2]-2)]
Data<-Seurat::ScaleData(t(as.matrix(Data)))
names(ColorsTreatment)<-levels(CAM$Treatment)
Top<-columnAnnotation(Treatment=anno_simple(Treatment,height = unit(4, "mm"),col = ColorsTreatment,border = TRUE), Cluster=anno_simple(Cluster,height=unit(2,"mm"),col=ColorMacrophageClusters),show_legend=FALSE,show_annotation_name=FALSE)
levels(Treatment)<-c("Naive","Sham","1d","3d")
HM<-Heatmap(Data,
            cluster_rows = FALSE,
            cluster_columns = FALSE,
            show_row_names = TRUE,
            show_column_names = FALSE,
            row_names_side = "left",
            top_annotation = Top,
            col=col_fun,
            show_heatmap_legend = FALSE,
            row_names_gp = gpar(fontsize=6),
            column_split = Treatment,
            column_title_gp = gpar(fontsize=8))
HMLeg<-grid.grabExpr(draw(Legend(col_fun = col_fun, 
                                  direction = "vertical",
                                  grid_height = unit(0.5,"mm"),
                                  grid_width=unit(1,"mm"),
                                  at=c(-2,0,2),
                                  labels_gp = gpar(col = "black",
                                                  fontface="plain",
                                                  fontsize=6),
                                  title_gp = gpar(col = "black",
                                                  fontface="plain",
                                                  fontsize=8),
                                  labels = c("-2", "0", "2"))))
HM_Ready<-plot_grid(grid.grabExpr(draw(HM)),HMLeg,rel_widths = c(10,1),nrow=1)
```

# Volcano plots
```{r}
toptable <- as.data.frame(Markers_1d)
toptable$lab <- rownames(Markers_1d)
Genes<-c("Ccl2","Ccl4","Fos","Il1b","Pf4","Ccl12","Malat1")
toptable[!(toptable$lab %in% Genes),]$lab<-NA
toptable[toptable$p_val_adj>0.05,]$lab<-NA
toptable[abs(toptable$avg_log2FC)<1,]$lab<-NA
toptable$xvals <- toptable[['avg_log2FC']]
toptable$yvals <- -log10(toptable[['p_val_adj']])
xlab<-bquote(~Log[2] ~ "fold change")
ylab<-bquote(~-Log[10] ~ italic(P))
Volcano24<-ggplot(toptable, aes(x = xvals, y = yvals)) + th + geom_point(na.rm = TRUE,size=0.1,color=ColorsTreatment[3])+ labs(title = '1d BBBO v Sham')+xlab(xlab) + ylab(ylab) + geom_label_repel(aes(label=lab),size=3,label.padding = unit(0.1, "lines"))+theme(panel.grid = element_blank())

toptable <- as.data.frame(Markers_3d)
toptable$lab <- rownames(Markers_3d)
Genes<-c("Malat1","Pf4","Lgals3","Ifitm3","Fos","Mrc1","Vim")
toptable[!(toptable$lab %in% Genes),]$lab<-NA
toptable[toptable$p_val_adj>0.05,]$lab<-NA
toptable[abs(toptable$avg_log2FC)<1,]$lab<-NA
toptable$xvals <- toptable[['avg_log2FC']]
toptable$yvals <- -log10(toptable[['p_val_adj']])
xlab<-bquote(~Log[2] ~ "fold change")
ylab<-bquote(~-Log[10] ~ italic(P))
Volcano72<-ggplot(toptable, aes(x = xvals, y = yvals)) + th + geom_point(na.rm = TRUE,size=0.1,fill=ColorsTreatment[4])+ labs(title = '3d BBBO v Sham')+xlab(xlab) + ylab(ylab) + geom_label_repel(aes(label=lab),size=3,label.padding = unit(0.1, "lines"))+theme(panel.grid = element_blank())
Volcanos<-plot_grid(Volcano24,Volcano72,nrow = 1,labels = c("H","I"))
```

# bar charts
```{r}
df<-as.data.frame(table(CAM$Treatment,CAM$clusters_labeled))
df$Treatment<-df$Var1
df$Cluster<-df$Var2
BC2<-ggplot(df, aes(y=Treatment,x=Freq,fill=Cluster)) + 
  scale_fill_manual(values = ColorMacrophageClusters,guide=guide_legend(nrow=1)) + 
  geom_bar(position="fill",stat="identity",color="black",size=0.1) + 
  geom_tile(aes(y=Treatment,x=0),fill=ColorsTreatment[df$Treatment],width=0.03,color="black") +
```

# ontology
```{r}
Terms<-c("cytokine activity",
         "response to chemokine",
         "extracellular exosome",
         "macrophage migration",
         "defense response",
         "innate immune response",
         "inflammatory response",
         "endosome")
Onto_1d$Treatment<-"1d"
Onto_3d$Treatment<-"3d"
All<-rbind(Onto_1d,Onto_3d)
OntoPlotdata<-All[All$Term %in% Terms,]
KSLab<-bquote(~-Log[10] ~ italic(P[KS]))
FisLab<-bquote(italic(P[Fis]))
library(scales) 
OntPlot<-ggplot(OntoPlotdata,aes(x=Treatment,y=Term))+
  geom_point(aes(color=-log(PVal_KS),size=PCT))+
  theme_minimal()+
  scale_color_gradient(low="#0E0028",high="#9A63FF",guide=guide_colorbar(title=KSLab,title.position = "top")) +
  scale_size_continuous(guide=guide_legend(title="Genes (%)",title.position = "top"))+
  geom_tile(aes(x=Treatment,y=0),fill=c(ColorsTreatment[as.numeric(OntoPlotdata$Treatment)+2]),height=0.1)+
  theme(legend.position = "right",
        axis.text.y = element_text(size=6),
        legend.direction = "vertical",
        legend.box = "vertical",
        legend.key.height = unit(3,"mm"),
        legend.key.size = unit(1,"mm"),
        legend.spacing = unit(0,"mm"),
        plot.margin = margin(0.5,0.5,0.5,0,"cm"),

        legend.box.spacing = margin(-0.5,0.5,0.25,0,"cm"),
        legend.text = element_text(size=6),
```

# Pie chart
```{r}
Integrated$Treatment<-factor(Integrated$Treatment,levels=c("Naive","Sham","1d BBBO","3d BBBO"))
df<-data.frame(table(Integrated$Treatment,Integrated$cell_type))
Norm<-table(Integrated$Treatment)
df$Total <- as.numeric(Norm[df$Var1])
df$Freq_Norm<-df$Freq/df$Total
df<-df[df$Var2=="CAM",]

Pie<-ggplot(df, aes(x=Var1, y=Freq_Norm, fill=Var1)) +
  geom_bar(stat="identity", width=1,color="black",size=0.25) + scale_fill_manual(values=ColorsTreatment,guide=guide_legend(nrow=2)) +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0,0.65),breaks = c(0,0.25,0.5),labels=c("0%","25%","50%"),expand = c(0,0),position = "right")+theme_minimal()+
  theme(legend.position=c(0.5,0.95),
        plot.margin=margin(0.5,0.5,0.5,0.5,"cm"),
        legend.title = element_blank(),
        legend.text = element_text(size=8),
        legend.key.size = unit(0.75,"line"),
        axis.line.x = element_line(size=0.1),
        axis.text.x = element_blank(),
        axis.title.y = element_blank()) + 
  ylab("CAM (% of Total Cells)") + 
  xlab("Treatment")
```
